text: @SenSchumer Political sniping does not help in a crisis. We must work together to contain the Coronavirus. In addition to CDC recommendations, consider good nutrition, healthy sleep, and hygiene to boost immune system and prevent exposure. https://t.co/Yf6n9y3m8i #tcot #tlot
